text: Ryszard Jarzembowski (24 December 1945 – 9 August 2021) was a Polish politician. He was member of the Senate from 1991 until 2005. He was born in Wedel, Poland. Jarzembowski was a member of the Democratic Left Alliance. Jarzembowski died on 9 August 2021 in Włocławek, Poland at the age of 75.Zmarł Ryszard Jarzembowski, wicemarszałek Senatu V kadencji, senator II, III i IV kadencji ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish journalists Category:Polish politicians
title: Ryszard Jarzembowski
